words: grain that has begun to ripen
classifier for birds and certain animals, one of a pair, some utensils, vessels etc
can only; obliged to do sth; to have no other choice
without any better option; to have to; to be forced to

only have ...; there is only ...; (used in combination with 才[cái]) it is only if one ... (that one can ...) (Example: 只有通过治疗才能痊愈[zhǐ yǒu tōng guò zhì liáo cái néng quán yù] "the only way to cure it is with therapy"); it is only ... (who ...) (Example: 只有男性才有此需要[zhǐ yǒu nán xìng cái yǒu cǐ xū yào] "only men would have such a requirement"); (used to indicate that one has no alternative) one can only (do a certain thing) (Example: 只有屈服[zhǐ yǒu qū fú] "the only thing you can do is give in")
only; merely; nothing but; no more than; it's just that ...
to see (the same thing) over and over again; to see, to one's surprise, (sth happen suddenly)
to have no alternative but to; to be obliged to
solely preoccupied (with one thing); engrossed; focusing (on sth); to look after only one aspect
solely engrossed in one thing; just (one thing, no need to worry about the rest); simply; by all means; please feel free; do not hesitate (to ask for sth)
extraWords: I'm afraid that...; perhaps; maybe; very likely
